original_text: It is God that gives beautiful clothes even to the grass. One day the grass is growing in the field, but the next day people will cut it and burn it. God will certainly take care of you, much more than he takes care of the grass. You should trust him more than you do!
korean_text: 오늘 있다가 내일 아궁이에 던져지는 들풀도 하나님이 이렇게 입히시거든 하물며 너희일까보냐 믿음이 작은 자들아

sentences.original_text: It is God that gives beautiful clothes
One day the grass is growing in the field
but the next day people will cut it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다음 날 사람들은 그것을 벨 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God will certainly take care of you
much more than he takes care of the grass
You should trust him more than you do
